description: This MCP server provides AI assistants with real-time access to RuneScape 3 game data through the RuneScape Wiki APIs. It enables AI systems to retrieve current Grand Exchange prices, detailed item information (including stats, examine text, and alchemy values), historical price trends with configurable time intervals, and player statistics from the official hiscores across different game modes (normal, ironman, hardcore ironman). The server acts as a bridge between AI applications and RuneScape's extensive database, allowing for dynamic queries about items, market analysis, player progression tracking, and game-related assistance without requiring direct API knowledge or authentication from the end user.

capabilities.name: get_item_price
capabilities.description: Get the current Grand Exchange price and details for a specific item

capabilities.name: get_ge_info
capabilities.description: Get Grand Exchange Database information including last update date

capabilities.name: get_category_info
capabilities.description: Get information about a specific item category

capabilities.name: get_all_categories
capabilities.description: Get a list of all item categories with their IDs and names.

capabilities.name: search_items
capabilities.description: Search for items by name, category, starting letter, price, or membership. Supports full-text search and advanced filters. Category numbers are listed in the README under "Item Category Mapping". Use get_all_categories for more details.

capabilities.name: get_item_detail
capabilities.description: Get detailed item information from the official Grand Exchange API including price trends, examine text, and metadata

capabilities.name: get_item_graph
capabilities.description: Get historical price graph data for an item from the official Grand Exchange API (last 180 days)

capabilities.name: browse_items_by_category
capabilities.description: Browse items by category from the official Grand Exchange catalogue

capabilities.name: get_ge_info
capabilities.description: Get Grand Exchange database information including last update time

capabilities.name: get_player_stats
capabilities.description: Get player statistics from RuneScape 3 hiscores

capabilities.name: get_wiki_page_content
capabilities.description: Fetch the plain text content of a RuneScape Wiki page (e.g., Mining, Smithing, etc.)
